collectible.title: New Mask of Hope
collectible.subtitle: Made by Miko
collectible.text: A mask made to represent the hopes of humanity. Needless to say, it takes the appearance of Miko. Originally given to Hata no Kokoro, but was rejected due to being too effective.

collectible.title: Replica Seven-Star Sword
collectible.subtitle: Made in China
collectible.text: An almost-perfect copy of Miko’s sword, The Shichi-Sei Ken (Seven-Star Sword). Not the actual one, of course. Miko needs that.
collectible.unlock:
Witness Miko show her true power against Saki Nikaidou.
[Make sure Miko is naked but not masturbating when Saki has to take off her boyshorts, her last item of clothing.]

collectible.title: Newspaper
collectible.subtitle: Now it’s a real Touhou doujin!
collectible.text: A clipping from Gensokyo’s one and only newspaper, the Bunbunmaru. Details the goings-on and gossip surrounding the land of illusion’s inhabitants.
